name: MealByMeal
title: mealbymeal.com
shortDescription: MealByMeal simplifies calorie tracking by allowing users to log meals via text messages. It targets individuals looking to manage their weight without the hassle of traditional calorie counting apps. Users simply text what they eat, and the system automatically logs it, supporting healthier eating habits and weight management. Example use case: A user wants to maintain a diet but finds apps like MyFitnessPal cumbersome. They switch to MealByMeal for easier tracking.
pros: Quick and easy meal logging via text
Automatic conversion of units and food tracking at restaurants
Supports multiple languages for broader accessibility
cons: Limited to text-based input which might not be as detailed
Only supports texting from the US without additional fees
